title: DDua Lipa looks effortlessly chic in a green coat and denim jeans as she enjoys a solo outing in NYC
text:
She's reportedly moved in with beau Anwar Hadid after only two months of dating.

But Dua Lipa enjoyed a solo outing without her new love, as she grabbed a quick take-out lunch in New York City on Thursday.

The singer, 24, put on a casually chic display and showed off her newly-dyed strawberry blonde locks during the day out.

Comfy: Dua Lipa looked effortlessly chic in a green coat and denim jeans as she enjoyed a solo outing in New York City on Thursday

Dua kept warm in a bright green coat that had an NY logo on one side, and which she wore half-closed over a dark blue jumper.

Continuing to keep things casual, the New Rules hitmaker completed her look by wearing a pair of straight-leg trousers and black trainers.

She pulled her blonde locks back into a slick bun and wore a light palette of make-up to accentuate her pretty features.

Casual: Dua kept warm in a bright green coat that had an NY logo on one side, and which she wore half-closed over a dark blue jumper

Meanwhile, according to The Sun, the Be the One hitmaker pocketed a whopping £9 million, making the equivalent of £24,000 ($29.4 million) each day through her firm Dua Lipa Limited.

Her assets are said to have increased to £11.8 million ($14.4 million) from £2.9 million ($3.5 million).

With two number one singles, One Kiss and IDGAF, under her belt, the brunette beauty has featured in fashion campaigns for Adidas and Jaguar, and recently became the face of YSL's new perfume, Libre.

Dua's representatives declined to comment when contacted by MailOnline.

Finishing touches: Continuing to keep things casual, the New Rules hitmaker completed her look by wearing a pair of straight-leg trousers and black trainers

Stylish: Dua pulled her blonde locks back into a slick bun and wore a light palette of make-up to accentuate her pretty features

Dua's outing comes after it was reported that she and Anwar have taken their relationship to the next level.

Reports have recently revealed that the pair have moved in together after only two months of dating.

Sources claim the singer and the model are renting an apartment in New York as they 'spend all of their time together' amid their busy work schedules.

'Dua and Anwar are spending all of their time together so it just made sense for them to rent this place,' an insider told The Sun.

Blossoming romance: Dua stepped out without beau Anwar Hadid, who she's reportedly moved in with after only two months of dating

Sweet: Sources claim the singer and the model are renting an apartment in New York as they 'spend all of their time together' amid their busy work schedules

'She’s always at his when she’s in LA and he stays with her in London so this felt like the natural step.'

'Once she comes back with new music she will spend more time in New York so it’s good for her to have a base there and it makes sense to him because a lot of his family live there.'

The couple are believed to have connected with each other over their musical talents, with both of them confessing they are a fan of one another.

Sparks flying: The couple are believed to have connected with each other over their musical talents, with both of them confessing they are a fan of one another

It was recently revealed the singer cashed in a whopping £9 million ($11 million) last year.

According to The Sun, the Be the One hitmaker pocketed a whopping £9 million, making the equivalent of £24,000 ($29.4 million) each day through her firm Dua Lipa Limited.

Her assets are said to have increased to £11.8 million ($14.4 million) from £2.9 million ($3.5 million).

With two number one singles, One Kiss and IDGAF, under her belt, the brunette beauty has featured in fashion campaigns for Adidas and Jaguar, and recently became the face of YSL's new perfume, Libre.

Dua's representatives declined to comment when contacted by MailOnline.
description: The singer, 24, enjoyed a solo outing without her new love, as she grabbed a quick take-out lunch in New York City on Thursday.
